title: Cycling Gloves, Max L287
description:
Stay warm and stylish with these multicolor fingerless gloves made from soft spandex. Perfect for men seeking comfort and functionality, these gloves allow for easy hand use while keeping your fingers cozy. Whether you're outdoors or at home, elevate your accessory game with this essential piece.
? Material: Spandex
? Pattern: Printed
? Gender: Men's
? Product Feature: Keep You Warm, Elegant Design
? Number Of Pieces: 1 Pc
? Color: Multicolor
? Package Includes: 1 x Fingerless Gloves
? ? Synthetic leather palm with shock-absorbing rubber and foam padding.
? ? Microfiber fabric of thumb quickly wipe the sweat on your face during the riding.
? ? Breathable moisture-wicking mesh fabric keeps your hands dry all day in summer.
? ? Velcro straps for adjusting the fit and easier way to put on and take off gloves.
? ? Hook and loop closure easily adjusts for a comfortable fit.
? ? Multi-Purpose use like cycling, motorcycle, fitness and outdoor sports etc.
? ? Manufactured by Litany Sports located in Pakistan.
? Note: There might be slight color differences as a result of varying lighting and monitor effects.
? Product Code: MZ1317200005LYSS
